mapper.select: SELECT MSFO.PHS_ORDER_NO , MSFO.ORDER_ITM , MSFO.LOT_NO , MSFO.FINL_STT , MSFO.CRT_DS , MSFO.IF_INFO_IDX , QPAR.PHS_ORDER_TYP , QPAR.ISP_REQ_NO , QPAP.ANS_NO , QPAP.ANS_PROC_CD , (SELECT DTL_NM FROM SY_CD_DTL SCD WHERE SCD.DTL_CD = QPAP.ANS_PROC_CD) AS ANS_PROC_NM , QPAP.SYT_JDG , (SELECT DTL_NM FROM SY_CD_DTL WHERE DTL_CD = QPAP.SYT_JDG) AS SYT_JDG_NM , QPAP.HLD_YN , QP.PITM_CD , QPI.PITM_NM , (SELECT DTL_NM FROM SY_CD_DTL SCD WHERE SCD.DTL_CD = QPI.PITM_TYP) AS PITM_TYP_NM FROM MS_SRM_FINL_ORDER MSFO LEFT JOIN QT_PITM_ANS_REQ QPAR ON MSFO.PHS_ORDER_NO = QPAR.PHS_ORDER_NO AND MSFO.ORDER_ITM = QPAR.PHS_ORDER_ITM AND MSFO.LOT_NO = QPAR.LOT_NO LEFT JOIN QT_PITM_ANS_PROC QPAP ON QPAR.PLNT_CD = QPAP.PLNT_CD AND QPAR.REQ_IDX = QPAP.REQ_IDX LEFT JOIN QM_PITM_SPEC QPS ON QPAP.PITM_SPEC_IDX = QPS.PITM_SPEC_IDX AND QPAR.MTR_CD = QPS.PITM_CD AND QPAP.PLNT_CD = QPS.PLNT_CD LEFT JOIN QM_PITM QP ON QPS.PITM_CD = QP.PITM_CD AND QPS.PITM_VER = QP.PITM_VER AND QPS.PLNT_CD = QP.PLNT_CD LEFT JOIN QM_PITM_INFO QPI ON QP.PITM_CD = QPI.PITM_CD AND QP.PITM_VER = QPI.PITM_VER AND QP.PLNT_CD = QPI.PLNT_CD WHERE QPAR.PLNT_CD = #{plntCd} AND MSFO.PHS_ORDER_NO = #{phsOrderNo} AND MSFO.ORDER_ITM = #{phsOrderItm} AND MSFO.LOT_NO = #{lotNo} ORDER BY QPAP.ANS_IDX, QPAP.REQ_IDX

SELECT MMFO.PDT_ORDER_NO , MMFO.ORDER_ITM , MMFO.LOT_NO , MMFO.FINL_STT , MMFO.CRT_DS , MMFO.IF_INFO_IDX , QPAR.PDT_ORDER_TYP , QPAR.ISP_REQ_NO , QPAP.ANS_NO , QPAP.ANS_PROC_CD , (SELECT DTL_NM FROM SY_CD_DTL SCD WHERE SCD.DTL_CD = QPAP.ANS_PROC_CD) AS ANS_PROC_NM , QPAP.SYT_JDG , (SELECT DTL_NM FROM SY_CD_DTL WHERE DTL_CD = QPAP.SYT_JDG) AS SYT_JDG_NM , QPAP.HLD_YN , QP.PITM_CD , QPI.PITM_NM , (SELECT DTL_NM FROM SY_CD_DTL SCD WHERE SCD.DTL_CD = QPI.PITM_TYP) AS PITM_TYP_NM FROM MS_MES_FINL_ORDER MMFO LEFT JOIN QT_PITM_ANS_REQ QPAR ON MMFO.PDT_ORDER_NO = QPAR.PDT_ORDER_NO AND MMFO.ORDER_ITM = QPAR.PHS_ORDER_ITM AND MMFO.LOT_NO = QPAR.LOT_NO LEFT JOIN QT_PITM_ANS_PROC QPAP ON QPAR.PLNT_CD = QPAP.PLNT_CD AND QPAR.REQ_IDX = QPAP.REQ_IDX LEFT JOIN QM_PITM_SPEC QPS ON QPAP.PITM_SPEC_IDX = QPS.PITM_SPEC_IDX AND QPAR.MTR_CD = QPS.PITM_CD AND QPAP.PLNT_CD = QPS.PLNT_CD LEFT JOIN QM_PITM QP ON QPS.PITM_CD = QP.PITM_CD AND QPS.PITM_VER = QP.PITM_VER AND QPS.PLNT_CD = QP.PLNT_CD LEFT JOIN QM_PITM_INFO QPI ON QP.PITM_CD = QPI.PITM_CD AND QP.PITM_VER = QPI.PITM_VER AND QP.PLNT_CD = QPI.PLNT_CD WHERE QPAR.PLNT_CD = #{plntCd} AND MMFO.PDT_ORDER_NO = #{pdtOrderNo} AND MMFO.ORDER_ITM = #{phsOrderItm} AND MMFO.LOT_NO = #{lotNo} ORDER BY QPAP.ANS_IDX, QPAP.REQ_IDX

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT MSIP.PLNT_CD , NULL AS MTR_CD , NULL AS BATCH_NO , MSIP.MTR_CD AS INP_MTR_CD , MSIP.BATCH_NO AS INP_BATCH_NO , MSIP.LOT_NO , MSIP.MTR_NM , MSIP.MRP_MNG , QPAR.ISP_REQ_NO , QPAP.ANS_NO , QPAP.ANS_PROC_CD , (SELECT DTL_NM FROM SY_CD_DTL SCD WHERE SCD.DTL_CD = QPAP.ANS_PROC_CD) AS ANS_PROC_NM , QPAP.SYT_JDG , (SELECT DTL_NM FROM SY_CD_DTL WHERE DTL_CD = QPAP.SYT_JDG) AS SYT_JDG_NM , QPAP.HLD_YN , MSIP.PHS_ORDER_NO , MSIP.PHS_ORDER_ITM , MSIP.PDT_ORDER_NO , MSIP.BWART , MSIP.ERFMG , MSIP.ERFME , MSIP.LGORT , MSIP.BUDAT , MSIP.ZEXFIELD1 , MSIP.ZEXFIELD2 , MSIP.ZEXFIELD3 , MSIP.ZEXFIELD4 , MSIP.ZEXFIELD5 FROM MS_SAP_INP_PFA MSIP LEFT JOIN QT_PITM_ANS_REQ QPAR ON MSIP.MTR_CD = QPAR.MTR_CD AND MSIP.BATCH_NO = QPAR.BATCH_NO LEFT JOIN QT_PITM_ANS_PROC QPAP ON QPAR.PLNT_CD = QPAP.PLNT_CD AND QPAR.REQ_IDX = QPAP.REQ_IDX WHERE MSIP.PLNT_CD = #{plntCd} AND MSIP.MTR_CD = #{pitmCd} AND MSIP.BATCH_NO = #{batchNo} UNION ALL SELECT SIPD.PLNT_CD , SIPD.MTR_CD , SIPD.BATCH_NO , SIPD.INP_MTR_CD , SIPD.INP_BATCH_NO , SIPD.LOT_NO , SIPD.MTR_NM , SIPD.MRP_MNG , QPAR.ISP_REQ_NO , QPAP.ANS_NO , QPAP.ANS_PROC_CD , (SELECT DTL_NM FROM SY_CD_DTL SCD WHERE SCD.DTL_CD = QPAP.ANS_PROC_CD) AS ANS_PROC_NM , QPAP.SYT_JDG , (SELECT DTL_NM FROM SY_CD_DTL WHERE DTL_CD = QPAP.SYT_JDG) AS SYT_JDG_NM , QPAP.HLD_YN , SIPD.PHS_ORDER_NO , SIPD.PHS_ORDER_ITM , SIPD.PDT_ORDER_NO , SIPD.BWART , SIPD.ERFMG , SIPD.ERFME , SIPD.LGORT , SIPD.BUDAT , SIPD.ZEXFIELD1 , SIPD.ZEXFIELD2 , SIPD.ZEXFIELD3 , SIPD.ZEXFIELD4 , SIPD.ZEXFIELD5 FROM MS_SAP_INP_PFA_DTL SIPD LEFT JOIN QT_PITM_ANS_REQ QPAR ON SIPD.MTR_CD = QPAR.MTR_CD AND SIPD.BATCH_NO = QPAR.BATCH_NO LEFT JOIN QT_PITM_ANS_PROC QPAP ON QPAR.PLNT_CD = QPAP.PLNT_CD AND QPAR.REQ_IDX = QPAP.REQ_IDX ) START WITH PLNT_CD = #{plntCd} AND MTR_CD IS NULL AND BATCH_NO IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR INP_MTR_CD = MTR_CD AND PRIOR INP_BATCH_NO = BATCH_NO
